channel.title: Repair Team
channel.description:
With our release of RS-Reborn nearing, there are probably going to be lots of bugs to be fixed. Since I'd like to be able to produce content fairly often, I'd like to get around 2 people who's soul purpose is to just fix bugs. For those who don't know, RS-Reborn is a remake of RuneScape. Unlike many others, we actually know what we're doing and plan to take this project very far. If applying, please fill out the form below.
[ol][li]Name[/li] [li]Age[/li] [li]Years working with Java[/li] [li]On a scale of 1-10, what would you say your Java knowledge is?[/li] [li]Past work (with proof; code would also be nice)[/li] [li]Time zone[/li] [li]Current projects[/li] [li]How active can you be[/li] [li]Skype[/li][/ol]

item.title: Repair Team
item.dc:creator: @Michael_P1 Michael P
item.description:
@Michael_P1 wrote:

With our release of RS-Reborn nearing, there are probably going to be lots of bugs to be fixed. Since I’d like to be able to produce content fairly often, I’d like to get around 2 people who’s soul purpose is to just fix bugs.

For those who don’t know, RS-Reborn is a remake of RuneScape. Unlike many others, we actually know what we’re doing and plan to take this project very far.

If applying, please fill out the form below.

[ol][li]Name[/li] [li]Age[/li] [li]Years working with Java[/li] [li]On a scale of 1-10, what would you say your Java knowledge is?[/li] [li]Past work (with proof; code would also be nice)[/li] [li]Time zone[/li] [li]Current projects[/li] [li]How active can you be[/li] [li]Skype[/li][/ol]

Read full topic
